page.title: 09A Day at Alban School
page.content: We come in from the playground at 9.00am and go into Meeting Point where we either watch or perform a play or listen to a story.At 9.30 we have Topic Studies.At the moment we are learning about villages.Then we have Bible Story for thirty minutes.After a break in the playground we come in and collect our sports bags to go to get changed for games.The games change with the seasons.At the moment we are doing cricket.At 12.00 we have our dinner.School starts again at 1.00 when we have a double lesson of Maths.We are working on averages now. In the final lesson our teacher sometimes reads us a story until 3.30. We then line up to catch the bus home. I arrive home at 4.05pm. Nearly all children enjoy life at Alban.It is a friendly school.
